title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 07 April 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:19 <DrLou> has quit  
00:35 <sdumitriu> has quit  
00:38 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
01:12 <polx> has quit  
07:12 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:21 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
07:24 <CIA-120> Vincent Massol master \* rba5f866 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/ba5f86620ec73b61bdb92223080d547151613317 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-ircbot/xwiki-platform-ircbot-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/ircbot/internal/wiki/DefaultWikiIRCBotManager.java : Remove unnecessary cast - http://git.io/fnqDJQ  
07:26 <vmassol> hi guys, would be nice if someone could check why we have this wanring:  
07:26 <vmassol> http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/1224/testReport/junit/org.xwiki.test.selenium/UsersGroupsRightsManagementTest/testCreateAndDeleteGroup/  
07:26 <vmassol> ie.  
07:26 <vmassol> 2012-04-07 00:52:22,121 [http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/get/XWiki/XWikiPreferences?xpage=getgroups&offset=1&limit=10&reqNo=1&wiki=local%5D WARN  o.h.d.f.TemplateRenderer       - Function template anticipated 4 arguments, but 3 arguments encountered  
09:21 <mflorea> has quit  
09:58 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:11 <Enygma`> has quit  
10:15 <vmassol> has quit  
17:57 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
19:02 <jacktrick> has joined #xwiki  
19:05 <jacktrick> has quit  
21:57 <polx> has quit  
23:42 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
23:52 <@sdumitriu> mflorea: Ping  
23:52 <+mflorea> pong  
23:52 <@sdumitriu> Any idea why we use portlet-api:portlet-api:1.0 instead of javax.portlet:portlet-api:2.0?  
23:53 <+mflorea> because the portlet api used in old core is 1.0  
23:54 <+mflorea> I'm not sure that we can upgrade to 2.0 by simply replacing the jar  
23:54 <@sdumitriu> OK, thanks  
23:54 <@sdumitriu> So there is a valid reason  
23:54 <+mflorea> the portlet I worked on is in contrib, and uses portlet api 2.0  
23:54 <+mflorea> yes  
23:55 <+mflorea> well, we have to clean up that code  
23:56 <+mflorea> since it wasn't maintained/tested I'm pretty sure it doesn't work, so we should probably move that code to legacy  
23:57 <+mflorea> e.g. XWikiPortletRequest  
23:57 <+mflorea> and co.
